channel.title: How do I fix health splats
channel.description: When I attack something I keep getting 0 splats all over my character like super fast hits on me, how do I fix this?

item.title: How do I fix health splats
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“Python_, post:5, topic:373690”][quote author=Ddragonimp link=topic=469693.msg3434328#msg3434328 date=1292630513]
Honestly
1 of these things
It usualy means a server null
Your lagging really badly

Or Npc has a really fast atk speed.

What source are you using?
[/quote]

God, your a idiot.

You edited “Attack Speed” , which is not what you intended to edit. Change the “40” back to “400”.[/quote]
Thats odd… in the post before you posted this. I said he changed atk speed…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix health splats

item.title: How do I fix health splats
item.dc:creator: @im_winner im winner
item.description:
@im_winner wrote:

No no no I didn’t edit the “400” I mean, the new damage hits … like new rs hits there. I was trying to change that but I ended up changing something so now everytime I walk or click something I get hit with a 0 doesn’t matter if i’m in combat or not. If i’m fighting a monster, say a black dragon, it’ll shut up as … 0-0-0 (1st hit in) 0-0-0 (another hit) but they’re always 0 unless it actually hits me, then it’ll be… 0-0-200-0-0 (continues)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix health splats

item.title: How do I fix health splats
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[quote=“im winner, post:6, topic:373690”]I didn’t change that but thanks for calling me an idiot. this is what I changed

public void dealDamage(int damage) {
if (teleTimer <= 0)
playerLevel[3] -= damage;
else {
if (hitUpdateRequired)
hitUpdateRequired = true;
if (hitUpdateRequired2)
hitUpdateRequired2 = true;
}

}

public int[] damageTaken = new int[Config.MAX_PLAYERS];

public void handleHitMask(int damage) {
	if (!hitUpdateRequired) {
		hitUpdateRequired = false;
		hitDiff = damage;
	} else if (!hitUpdateRequired2) {
		hitUpdateRequired2 = false;
		hitDiff2 = damage;		
	}
	updateRequired = true;
}

}[/quote]

I was referring to “Ddragonimp” (s) post… But…?

I don’t get what you edited…?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix health splats

item.title: How do I fix health splats
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Where is the 400 you edited please show that.

item.source: How do I fix health splats

item.title: How do I fix health splats
item.dc:creator: @im_winner im winner
item.description:
@im_winner wrote:

I didn’t change that but thanks for calling me an idiot. this is what I changed

public void dealDamage(int damage) {
if (teleTimer <= 0)
playerLevel[3] -= damage;
else {
if (hitUpdateRequired)
hitUpdateRequired = true;
if (hitUpdateRequired2)
hitUpdateRequired2 = true;
}

}

public int[] damageTaken = new int[Config.MAX_PLAYERS];

public void handleHitMask(int damage) {
	if (!hitUpdateRequired) {
		hitUpdateRequired = false;
		hitDiff = damage;
	} else if (!hitUpdateRequired2) {
		hitUpdateRequired2 = false;
		hitDiff2 = damage;		
	}
	updateRequired = true;
}

}

Read full topic
